metadata.name: HackTool - RemoteKrbRelay Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of RemoteKrbRelay, a Kerberos relaying tool via CommandLine flags and PE metadata.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\remotekrbrelay.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('remotekrbrelay.exe') OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -clsid ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -target ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -victim ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-rbcd ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-cn ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--computername '))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-chp ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-chppass ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-chpuser ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-addgroupmember ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-group ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-groupuser ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-smb ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--smbkeyword ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('interactive')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('secrets')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('service-add')))))

output.summary: Detects the use of RemoteKrbRelay, a Kerberos relaying tool via CommandLine flags and PE metadata.
